articles.description: DAVID PRICE claimed Anthony Joshua had to be “helped up” after he knocked him out with a “big right hand” in sparring. The pair of British heavyweights were former training …
articles.content:
DAVID PRICE claimed Anthony Joshua had to be "helped up" after he knocked him out with a "big right hand" in sparring. 
The pair of British heavyweights were former training partners at Team GB's Sh… [+2980 chars]
